featured.text: It is not ESPN, the all-sports cable network, or even MTV, which is famous for its music videos.

definition.zh_def: 美國一家專注於體育新聞、賽事轉播和體育相關內容的媒體公司。
definition.en_def: An American media company that focuses on sports news, event broadcasting, and sports-related content.
definition.example: I always watch ESPN to catch up on the latest sports highlights.
